Message.Msg: Surely U make a good punto but how is this any differencia than compania XYZ?

Topic.Title: Say it ain't so. A dem wouldn't do this.

Message.Msg: The top marginal tax rate was 38.5% at the end of Reagan's presidency. Before Reagan, it was 50%. In the 1950s, it was up in the 90%. In exchange, wealthy people get a low rate on capital gains. The idea that "no one in the U.S. should have to pay a 36% Fed. Income TAX" as a marginal rate on earned income just does not match American history or economic reality. I have no idea what Obama tax decrease for the middle class you are talking about. In fact, most of your post is unintelligible.

Topic.Title: Say it ain't so. A dem wouldn't do this.

Message.Msg: Also, Jon, I am a fairly wealthy individual. I was not suffering economically in 2010. I was finishing my fellowship and starting my practice. Most of the income on my early contracts materialized in 2011. I was able to claim certain deductions and credits related to that and other things. My only point in telling this story is to point out just how ludicrous it is to call someone a freeloader because he or she did not pay income tax in a certain year, particularly during the height of a recession. I'm sure alot of very enterprising people took big hits. The types of plush, union jobs that provide stable income throughout life are disappearing. You will see more people who have tight years at some point in their lives. They may need some assistance during those times. There is no reason to treat these people with the contempt they have been treated with. And if Republicans continue to do so they will continue to lose elections. They did not lose the election because 47% of Americans are dependent on government. They lost the election because they do not understand the modern economy and how people live, work and succeed in it.

Topic.Title: Dumping of T continues and continues and...

Message.Msg: The chart http://finance.yahoo.com/echarts?s=T#symbol=t;range=1y;compare=;indicator=dividend+bollinger+sma%2820%29+volume+stochasticslow+rsi;charttype=candlestick;crosshair=on;ohlcvalues=1;logscale=off;source=undefined; does not support your claim of dumping. Average volume is 26 million shares and note that there are only a few days when the volume has varied from that more than a 10%. Also note that the current price is a little above the 20 DMA. The Bollinger Bands are moving together and December seems to be shaping up as a pretty flat month. Don't count out $38. Notice what happens when the Bollinger Bands are close together for a while. A rapid breakout occurs. The last one was downward. The next is most likely to be upward. Don't lose sight of the fact that the dollar is losing its' value and it will take more dollars in the future to buy shares of AT&T.
Something is rotten in Denmark - T is being eviscerated.

It is a very long URL but, if cut and pasted, it does bring up the chart that supports everything I posted. http://finance.yahoo.com/echarts?s=T#symbol=t;range=1y;compare=;indicator=dividend+bollinger+sma%2820%29+volume+stochasticslow+rsi;charttype=candlestick;crosshair=on;ohlcvalues=1;logscale=off;source=undefined
Every day. Scary part is VZ isn't - so it's not a sector or fear of dividend tax increase situation.

"I don't consider most of the legislation passed since Obama became President good for this country" Well, this country disagrees with you, and has asked for more, including Obama's take on dealing with fiscal issues. To pretend Obama and Congress have not accomplished anything simply because YOU don't like what it accomplished is nonsensical. And they've done this all in spite of a recalcitrant minority party dead set against America accomplishing anything--at least while Obama is president.

Topic.Title: T 2013 Price Target $33.50 According To Guggenheim

Message.Msg: AT&T was $31 just last April but it was $38 by August. The 200 SMA (now $34.46) is still in an uptrend even though trading has been below that line for the past month. In fact it looks as if the 50 EMA will cross below the 200 SMA in about two weeks. That might trigger a short term sell off but I doubt it will take us to $31. If it does, buy all you can because inflation is on the way at it will make stock prices increase.

"To pretend Obama and Congress have not accomplished anything simply because YOU don't like what it accomplished is nonsensical." Other than health care, what have they accomplished? They can't even get a budget passed for the past three years. That by the way is not the fault of the Republicans when Harry won't even submit it for a vote. Harry is blocking things up as much as anyone. Harry Reid is nonsensical, and useless!

"It is not a good reason for rehashing the same old anti-Semitic conspiracy theories loons like you buy into, which in turn make you tools of those making the contributions." Sorry but I failed to read any anti-Semitic comments in lewcors message. If by chance that many of the top levels of Goldman happen to be of that faith, so what? Did he denounce anyone for being of that faith or race? No, you assumed it all on your own and used your supposition to make deprecating comments about someone's post because you disagree with it. Is that a reflection of your character perhaps?

Winholder, he didn't say there happen to be many Jewish people at the top levels of Goldman Sachs. He said Goldman Sachs "is the front in this country for the Rothschilds." Now I repeat, that is the same old anti-semitic conspiracy theories loons like you buy into.

There is only one side and both the Republicans and the Democrats are on that side. Both want one World government and are destroying America to accomplish that end. If we don't get a large segment of both parties to switch to the Constitution Party by the 2014 elections, we are doomed.

Again, you can try to shift the blame for Tea Party stonewalling all you want, Americans know who is responsible. We had two years of sweeping legislative accomplishment, then nothing. What changed between those two Congresses, winholder? Having trouble remembering?

Anti-Semitic? You mean Sammy Davis Jr. was a "Semite?" Few if any of the other's are either as their own writings say 85% are of a Turko-Mongol tribe called Khazars converted to Phariseeism 1,200 years ago in So, Russia, Google the word and learn something about "The Big Lie".
